original_text: But God himself gave his promise to Abraham. It was not necessary to have somebody in between, like Moses.
korean_text: 그 중보자는 한 편만 위한 자가 아니나 하나님은 한 분이시니라

sentences.original_text: But God himself gave his promise to Abraham
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님 자신이 아브라함에게 그의 약속을 주셨다

sentences.original_text: It was not necessary to have somebody in between
sentences.korean_translation: 중간에 다른 사람이 있을 필요는 없었다
